member.name: M:ArtPlatform.API.Controllers.AdminSellerRequestsController.GetSellerRequests(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a list of all of the requests from users to become a seller.
member.param: The amount of records to return.
member.returns: A list of seller profile requests

member.name: M:ArtPlatform.API.Controllers.AdminSellerRequestsController.GetSellerRequestsCount
member.summary: Gets the amount of requests there are from users to become a seller.

member.name: M:ArtPlatform.API.Controllers.AdminSellerRequestsController.AcceptSellerRequest(System.String)
member.summary: Accepts a request to become a seller from a user.
member.param: The ID of the user to accept the request for.
